Module roborally
Package game.gameObjects.decks

Class Deck

java.lang.Object
game.gameObjects.decks.Deck
Direct Known Subclasses:
DamageCardDeck, DiscardDeck, ProgrammingDeck, SpamDeck, TrojanDeck, VirusDeck, WormDeck
public abstract class Deck
extends java.lang.Object
The abstract class Deck provides methods for the different inheriting decks.
Author:
annika

      public int size()
      Indicates the size of the deck. Depending on the size, e.g., it needs to be reshuffled.
